body.name: HOTLIFE Bluetooth Mouse, Wireless Mouse with Dual Mode (Bluetooth 5.1+USB/Type-c) 2.4GHz Rechargeable Silent LED Mouse for Laptop/MacBook/iPad/Computer/Gaming - Purple & Black Gradient
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: ➣➣Dual Mode Bluetooth Mouse (BT 5.1 + 2.4GHz): The wirless mouse has Bluetooth and USB two connection mode, just press the button on the back of the mouse, you can realize the free switch in two devices. Convenient switching, suitable for any occasion.

➣➣Wireless Mouse with Colorful Lights: 7 different RGB colors of LED lights change randomly when in use, and the mouse is made of glossy material, providing a soothing light that creates a cool and gorgeous atmosphere for work and play or as gaming mouse, show your personality.

➣➣Wide Compatibility Ergonomic Mouse: 2.4GHz wireless mode is for laptop, PC, computer or any device with USB/Type-C port, plug and play. Mouse Bluetooth mode is for Windows 8/10 or later, Android 5.0 or later, MacOS/IOS 13 or later for easy pairing and connection.

➣➣Silent Mouse Rechargeable: Noiseless clicking, no need to worry about disturbing others around you, let you focus on your work. Built-in durable rechargeable battery can be easily charged with the included USB cable. Charge it for 2 hours and it can be continued used for 8-10 days.

➣➣Package Included: Portable Mouse x1; USB receiver x1; Type-C Adapter x1; User manner x1; USB cable x1. For any questions about your computer mouse, you can contact us and we will get back to you within 24 hours to help. *Please fully charge the mouse before using it for the first time.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,556 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Wireless, Portable, Ergonomic Design, Rechargeable, LED Lights

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I really like the color (a deep purple).It is very easy to use. Just put the USB plug into your laptop, turn on the switch under the mouse, and it's ready.Pros: light weight and slimWireless and rechargeable (came charged and ready to use out of the box, so that was great)I Love that the USB stores right under the mouse. (My last one did not so I always had to make sure I didn't lose that little thing whenever I took it off.)You can use it with the mouse lights on or off. They are nice but personally it didn't matter to me if my mouse lit up or not. But for those who love using colored lights, I'm sure you will love it.Cons: none

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still Going Strong
reviews.reviewText: I don’t even remember how long ago I bought this mouse, but it’s still going strong and still looks good. I know it’s been a while. My keyboard, which I bought at the same time, is already worn down, but the mouse is still great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works really well
reviews.reviewText: I like the way the mouse lights up and change colors. If you use it at night it helps like a little night light. Unfortunately I dropped mine a couple of times so it doesn't work anymore. Overall I think it's a good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bluetooth is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t had any issues with this mouse since I bought it and I use it every day. I had a Bluetooth mouse prior to purchasing this one but it stopped responding to my computer and wouldn’t stay charged for more then a few hours, ever since I purchased this mouse I haven’t had any issues with it and have only charged it once!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet, efficient and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Perfect wireless mouse for anyone wanting a quiet experience. Love the fact that it doesn't require batteries. The charge lasts a very long time and gives you ample warning when it needs plugged in again. The plug goes into your USB recepticle, and easily works while charging. It's also very comfortable to use. Best mouse that I have ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Useless, moving when not in use, doesnt scroll correctly
reviews.reviewText: I bought the original mouse and it worked for about 2 days. Right out of the box the scroll wheel was tight in one section and took a lot of effort to operate. After about two days the cursor started jumping around the screen when I wasn't touching the mouse. If I moved the mouse it would stop for a short while but a couple hours later it became totally useless when it starting moving the pointer constantly. I sent it back for an exact exchange which came the next day (Thanks, Amazon!). Unfortunately this mouse was bad from the moment I turned it on. The scroll wheel has a similar issue of tightness in just one area, the power button sits lower than the sliders on the bottom of the mouse which causes it to drag on the mouse pad, and this one is also experiencing the same cursor issue as the mouse previous to it. I am sending this one back and getting a totally different brand.The one thing that really sticks out to me is the "QC Passed," sticker that sealed both mouse boxes when they arrived. I'm sure that sticker is just a decoration because neither of these could have passed a quality control test.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and cheap
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to sync up. And works perfectly for my Microsoft go 2

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great but broke
reviews.reviewText: Started using in end of Jan and already broke. Kept on the box and right side of it broke and light won't turn on now
